pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 10, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the opening ceremonies for the Taste of the Danforth and will deliver remarks.

Main stage at Danforth Avenue and Logan Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 7:30 p.m.

Media appearances

9:00 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Univision Canada.
